items.content_text:
🐄British farmer’s bone-chilling warning: Starmer and Gates plan 50% cut in farm animals by 2050?

Pro Farmers United organizer Tim Taylor claims he has seen a document highlighting insidious plans by the government and powerful global business interests to squeeze Britain’s farmers into a 50-100% reduction in farm animal allowances in 25 years’ time.

🗣“Guess who has signed up to that: yes, the two biggest ***holes in the world: Starmer and Bill Gates…So it looks like their little world takeover is coming along nicely for them, but unfortunately, we’ve now got the document,” Taylor said.

👉While the nature of his info remains unclear, UK and European climate initiatives’ objectives are often hidden in plain sight. For instance, the Climate Change Committee recommends a 20% drop in meat and dairy consumption by 2030, and a 38% cut in livestock by 2050 to achieve so-called “net-zero emissions.”

📌Britain is one of scores of countries where farmers are sounding the alarm about globalist plans for food – from reductions in meat production to the monopolization of farmland, leaving millions starving. Or perhaps that’s the whole point?

items.title: ✈️🇨🇳 China’s latest warplane raises stakes against...
items.content_text:
✈️🇨🇳 China’s latest warplane raises stakes against Pentagon’s Indo-Pacific challenge 

The new KJ-3000 warplane is taking airborne surveillance and strike power to the next level, and it's a direct challenge to US military expansion in the region.

What makes it stand out?

🔴 Two back-to-back radar arrays offer 360-degree coverage and track smaller targets farther away with higher resolution — meaning early detection and countering stealth fighters and drones.

🔴 Based on the Y-20 cargo plane, the KJ-3000 can fly up to 8,000 km at 13 km altitude — the perfect vantage point for its advanced radars.

🔴 Rectangular fairings on the rear fuselage likely house dual-band active electronically scanned array antennas, boosting side-target detection precision.

🔴 Additional sensors on the nose, tail, and fuselage bolster signal intelligence capabilities.

🔴 An aerial refueling probe above the cockpit extends its time on station, ensuring persistent coverage.

An intel hub and EW powerhouse

🔴 The KJ-3000 is more than just a radar platform—it's a network node for intelligence, surveillance, and reconnaissance (ISR), boosting strike precision by updating missile guidance mid-flight. 

🔴 In a May exercise, China’s Type 055 destroyer launched a simulated attack, with an AEW&C aircraft guiding the strike.

🔴 It can also coordinate air and electronic warfare operations from hundreds of kilometers away.

China’s expanding power

🔴 According to the Pentagon’s 2024 China Military Power Report, China now fields more AEW\&C aircraft than the US, signaling its strategic pivot to dominate the East and South China Seas, the Western Pacific, and beyond.

🔴 As the US continues to militarize the Indo-Pacific, China’s increasing strength is impossible to ignore.

👍  Boost us | Chat | @geopolitics_prime

items.title: 🇺🇸📉 Trump's tariffs: The 'debt solution' that coul...
items.content_text:
🇺🇸📉 Trump's tariffs: The 'debt solution' that could sink the US economy

Remember when Trump promised his tariffs would pay off the US debt? The idea was simple: tariffs on imports would generate revenue, which could be used to reduce the national deficit.

Early economic modelling by experts suggests a much BLEAKER picture. The revised tariffs, set to take effect soon, are expected to cost the US economy $108 billion in GDP annually—or $861 per household.

🔴Higher consumer prices: Consumers will see prices rise across the board, as tariffs make goods more expensive.

🔴Export decline: US exports are forecasted to drop by $451 billion, a significant blow to the economy.

🔴Supply chain disruption: Increased costs will cause more disruptions in global supply chains, affecting US businesses.

Global сonsequences

👉While other markets like China and the European Union will also suffer losses, the US is predicted to feel the LARGEST IMPACT.

Countries like Brazil and Switzerland face even steeper tariffs, while Australia and the UK are relatively spared—but the global economy will still feel the shockwaves.

📌Rather than solve the US debt crisis, Trump’s tariffs could deepen its economic problems.

👍 Boost us | Chat | @geopolitics_prime

items.title: 🤡 Are masks FINALLY OFF? US speaker calls West Ban...
items.content_text:
🤡 Are masks FINALLY OFF? US speaker calls West Bank ‘Israeli’

US House Speaker Mike Johnson just visited Israeli settlements in the West Bank and openly called the territory “Judea and Samaria.”

“Judea and Samaria are the front line of the state of Israel and must remain an integral part of it,” Johnson reportedly said in the Israeli settlement of Ariel in the occupied West Bank.

❓ Why this matters

🔴 Since 1967, American leaders have avoided high-level visits to settlements considered illegal under international law, as affirmed by the International Court of Justice and the Fourth Geneva Convention.

🔴 The Biblical name ‘Judea and Samaria’ is what Israel calls the West Bank, the larger enclave of the Palestinian territories on the western bank of the Jordan River, and home to approximately 3 million ethnic Palestinians.

🔴 The Palestinian Foreign Ministry condemned the visit as a “blatant violation of international law.”

Changing US stance

➡️  America is no longer interested in the prospect of a Palestinian state, US Ambassador to Israel Mike Huckabee indicated to Bloomberg in June, adding:

“Unless there are some significant things that happen that change the culture, there’s no room for it.”

➡️  In February 2025, Rep. Brian Mast (R-Fla.), Chair of the House Foreign Affairs Committee, directed Republican staff to replace "West Bank" with "Judea and Samaria" in all official communications.

➡️ As for Israel, the Knesset recently voted to "extend sovereignty" over the West Bank.

➡️ The majority backed applying Israeli law to the West Bank, the Jordan Valley, and all of what they call the “historic homeland of the Jewish people,” urging the government to make it official. Code for formal annexation?

items.title: 🚨💰🇺🇸US Dollar SCAM: Printing trillions & spreading...
items.content_text:
🚨💰🇺🇸US Dollar SCAM: Printing trillions & spreading INFLATION worldwide

Since 1971, when the US 37th president Richard Nixon ended the dollar’s gold backing, the US has been free to print trillions of dollars out of thin air.

🤔 HOW IT WORKS:

▪️Before 1971, $1 was tied to 1/35 oz of gold — a fixed value. After that, the dollar became fiat, backed only by the Federal Reserve (Fed) printing power.

▪️The Fed doesn’t just print cash — it now creates digital dollars by buying govt bonds.

▪️From 2020 to 2022, the money supply (M2) surged 40%, adding nearly $10 trillion. By mid-2025, M2 reached $22 trillion — steadily eroding the value of your money.

🫣 SEIGNIORAGE — HIDDEN THEFT:

▪️Printing $100 costs just 12 cents — that difference, called seigniorage, nets the U.S. $50–100 billion every year.

▪️Worldwide, this hidden scam siphons off a staggering $804 billion annually from the global economy.

📈 INFLATION? ENGINEERED DEPRECIATION

▪️Most dollars today were created post-2020, with no increase in goods. This drives inflation — your savings buy less.

▪️For example, $100K in 2019 is worth roughly $65K in 2025 due to inflation fuelled by excessive dollar printing.

📊 US TRADE DEFICIT:

▪️The US has imported over $15 trillion in real goods from the world since 1971 — oil, electronics, food.

▪️In return it exports worthless paper dollars printed endlessly, saddling other countries with inflation and debt.

🌐 GLOBAL IMPACT:

▪️Dollar strength crushes emerging markets. Turkey’s lira collapse and 80% inflation in 2022 is just one example.

▪️Other nations face inflation spikes, debt, and poverty due to dollar 'dominance'.

🌀 ILLUSION OF US STABILITY

US govt debt keeps rising, but dollar still rules:

▪️USD is involved in 88% of global foreign exchange trades
▪️ Holds 57.8% of global reserves (IMF data)
▪️ $6.63 trillion in foreign dollar reserves

Dollar lets US print, borrow, and spend like no other — while the rest of the world bears the hidden cost. 😠

Dr. Thomas Seyfried, a leading cancer researcher, delivers a blunt truth:

➡️Higher blood sugar = faster tumor growth.
➡️Lower blood sugar = slower tumor growth. Undeniable.

According to Seyfried:

🔴 Cancer cells thrive on glucose & glutamine – starve them, and they weaken.

🔴 Water-only fasting + low-carb diet → nutritional ketosis, which makes tumors disappear slowly as the body dissolves them.

🔴 Keep mitochondria healthy with vigorous exercise, fasting, and avoiding processed carbs.

💬 Cancer doesn’t happen overnight. But if we stop feeding it, we can stop it from growing, the researcher summarizes.
